Best multiplayer experience out there! Nicest players, 5/5 community, very casual friendly! I recommend P90 for new players, solid pick and reasonably balanced! The only multiplayer experience wherein you (will) can learn russian! Remember, the best offense is defense! Just sit in a corner and wait for the enemies to come. Try to kill your enemies armed only with a knife! it will be hilarious!
